Class Vehicle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Vehicle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Vehicle>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Car, Truck, Van

    public abstract class Vehicle
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Vehicle>
    Abstract vehicle class.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matt Mackenzie & James Macak

    • Constructor Detail

      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle(java.lang.String make,
               java.lang.String model,
               java.lang.String year,
               java.lang.String color,
               java.lang.String numberOfCylinders,
               java.lang.String numberOfDoors,
               java.lang.String vinNumber,
               java.lang.String licensePlate,
               java.lang.String companyID,
               double dailyRentalPrice,
               double currentMiles,
               double gasCapacity)
        Parameterized constructor for a vehicle. Must include the vinNumber and licensePlate because no setters exist.
        Parameters:
        make - The make of the vehicle.
        model - The model of the vehicle.
        year - The year of the vehicle.
        color - The color of the vehicle.
        numberOfCylinders - The number of cylinders in the vehicle's engine.
        numberOfDoors - The number of doors on the vehicle.
        vinNumber - The VIN number of the vehicle.
        licensePlate - The license plate number of the vehicle.

      • Vehicle

        public Vehicle(java.lang.String vinNumber,
               java.lang.String licensePlate,
               java.lang.String companyID,
               double dailyRentalPrice)
        Null constructor for a vehicle. However, must include the vinNumber and licensePlate and rental price because no setters exist.
        Parameters:
        vinNumber - The VIN number of the vehicle.
        licensePlate - The license plate number of the vehicle.

        public void setAvailable()
